overview: Staying Single When - KMF's first cinema film/strong/u A sell-out when released at the Kirirom Cinema in Phnom Penh in 2008, the movie also attracted record audiences during its three broadcasts on CTN, Cambodia's most popular TV channel. bStory/b/u Sarun, a hotel manager, is desperate to find a wife. With the help of his friends and family, will he succeed in meeting his dream woman?
title: Staying Single When
